query:
SELECT g.*, p.name as player_name, t.name as team_name, c.slug
FROM goal g
JOIN player p ON g.player_id = p.id
JOIN team t ON p.team_id = t.id
JOIN campaign c ON t.campaign_id = c.id
WHERE c.slug = 'besta';
